Comments_List: it was a great survey of the history and current status of biomems and microdevices.
Some basics about microdevices and their application.
lots of good information, though it was all delivered orally during the lecture. it would have been good to have accompanying readings with the class to supplement what we learned in class.
It's very well organized course with lab tour when students can have hands on experience.
yes, if you're interested in learning about the topic it's a great course to take. prof fan is very knowledgeable and fun to learn from!
